description:
Speaker: Stefan Maier

Track:PyData
Usually, uncertainties of Machine Learning predictions are just regarded as a sign of poor prediction accuracy or as a consequence of lacking input features. This talk illustrates how modeling uncertainties can improve ML based decisions.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/QHNEFT
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Embrace uncertainty! Why to go beyond point estimators for...
